value: once upon a time there was a family that
took a long long drive way up north they
were going through old country roads
very narrow and winding there was
forests on either side no streetlights
and they've been driving for many hours
without passing so much as a driveway or
a sign or a light even so they were
getting deeper and deeper into the woods
when all of a sudden they see up on the
road ahead a tree that had fallen down
and was blocking their path they got out
they walked up to it they gave it a
couple of shoves but it was clearly too
heavy there was no way they could move
it they didn't have anything in their
car like chains or any sort of winch
they couldn't move it they just didn't
have what it took to get this tree off
the road well as luck would have it
along comes a guy in a big machine that
is specially made for moving things like
trees off the road and he says for five
hundred dollars I'll move this tree for
you in the family well it's kind of a
drag to have to pay five hundred dollars
but what else are we gonna do our other
option is to pretty much retrace our
steps almost all the way back home so
they took him up on it
they paid him the money and he hooked
the tree up to the truck and he dragged
it down the way and they were so happy
and they were getting back in their car
but to think thinking they were gonna
drive off when the guy stops and he
unhooks the tree and he turns around and
gives them a face and they said what are
you doing the tree is still in the road
and he said oh I never said I was gonna
move it off the road so the family was
very upset needless to say they knew
they'd been had and they didn't know
what they were gonna do they were just
about to give up and drive away and go
back home basically give up on their
vacation say goodbye to their $500 and
feel really really bad about themselves
that they had been suckered this way but
up from behind them comes a man in a
smaller truck and he doesn't have a big
machine and he doesn't have what it
takes to move the tree on his own but he
does have chains and cables and a friend
and they say let's do this
let's try at least to move this tree
forget that guy and the guy with the
machine starts laughing he points out
that their truck isn't strong enough and
even with both cars together it would
never work and those chains might break
and it's fairly dangerous and do they
really want to take that chance listen
he says trust me I'll move the tree this
time you guys pull your money come up
with as much as you can and give it to
me and I'll move the tree for real this
time
so the family in the car wants to go for
it they want to take this guy up on his
offer the machine guy the guy who ripped
them off they think well he won't he he
won't do this again now he's I mean look
he's gotten his heap he made his joke he
already ripped us off this time there's
more of us he wouldn't dare do it again
and the guys with the truck are like no
we have got to try this on our own I
mean come on let's at least try it and
they start to hook up the cables and the
family from the caracal smacks their
hand away tries to get the chains out of
their hands tells them no no we don't
want any part of this don't don't even
try and the guy with the machine is just
laughing at all this and he's saying
that the family is right you're right he
says your best bet is me I'm your best
bet those guys are dangerous
those guys are ruining your vacation you
could be on your way if it wasn't for
those guys and the guys in the truck you
know they want to give it a chance they
want to they want to try it but they
know they can't do it by themselves they
need the people in the car to agree so
that there could be two vehicles pulling
and maybe just maybe it would work but
it was no use
next thing the guys knew they turned
around in the family was paying this guy
with the machine another $500 and sure
enough he dragged the tree up the
straight a little further and left it
there and there they stood all looking
at each other everybody knowing exactly
their role in the situation the people
who who could possibly fix the situation
were helpless to the con-artist and the
coward
that's how I see Canada right now that's
how I see a lot of situations the con
men want to protect their racket and the
people they're too scared to put faith
in themselves the upstarts get labeled
as crazy I'm watching that scenario play
out right now I'm watching it play out
right now I said I wasn't gonna comment
directly on Canadian politics anymore
but those of you watching what's
happening with the federal conservatives
right now you can all guess who is who
in that situation there's somebody
offering to put themselves out there
if only he can get people to join him
he's offering to take the chance of
moving the tree off the road the whole
way if only the people who want the tree
off the road will help him out but
what's happening all the con men and all
the lazy people are banding together and
saying no no no no let's just dry it
drag the tree down the road a little bit
more let's just keep the con going let's
just keep it going it's safer at least
we all understand our place inside this
con will happen if we actually work
together and move the tree off the road
then what we don't know what's down
there ah human psychology it's great
there's a name for this phenomenon it's
called the crabs in the bucket all the
crabs at the bottom of the bucket and
they see a crab reaching for the edge to
pull himself over and what do the other
crabs do pull him down they pull him
back down well I would like to think
that the average human is smarter than
the average crab because really truth be
told what the crabs are probably doing
is probably they're trying to climb up
the other crab to get out themselves in
Canada we just literally pull the crabs
back down from the edge
and make them suffer in the swampy
bottom with the rest of them thanks guys
thanks will the people who are willing
to put in the work and willing to take
the risk and willing to rely on
themselves will the people who are
willing to say we've had enough of this
con game as comfortable as it is to just
keep the status quo we need to blow it

the machine the con men the
establishment the status quo they've got
all the media outlets they've got all
the leverage
they've got tradition and they've made
all the other people go into a sense of
learned helplessness they're pushing
those buttons right now it'll never work
don't even try he's dividing the party
it's you guys and your crazy ideas of
change that are wrecking everything it
all sounds like crap to me because the
easy solution is just to join together
and beat them it just is
otherwise you're literally voting for

yeah we can we can pitch Fitz and whine

that's nuts what are you thinking oh my

things might not go exactly according to

what is your plan anyways get some
